page.title: 09 OUR SCHOOL
page.content: {Little Sutton C.of E. Primary {School}stands on Berwick Road near "The Olde School House Hotel". It was built in{1867,}the date being engraved at the site of the old bell tower. The five classes, three infant and two junior,total 100 pupils. Recently {class One,}whilst studying the Edwardians, invited{a 70 year old {lady,}a former pupil to come into school to talk. She{described}being caned by the Headmaster for being late and not standing up straight. Class One were relieved that this does not happen now! When asked{what changes they would notice if they came back to the school{in 70 years time,}some of the pupils thought that teachers would have been{replaced by robots and {computers.}Would there still be books and paper? They will have to wait and see!
